detaileddescription.para: Define the types of stages in a material.
Constructor for MaterialDoc.
Destructor for MaterialDoc.

Initializes the MaterialDoc instance with a specific idMaterial. This method will parse the material into the internal dictionary representation and optionally allow the idMaterial object to reparse the source.
material
The idMaterial instance to use.
parseMaterial
Flag to determine if the material should be parsed into the editor representation.
parseRenderMaterial
Flag to determine if the idMaterial object should be reparsed.
Returns the number of stages in this material.

Returns the index of the stage with the specified type and name or -1 if the stage does not exist.
stageType
The type of stage to find.
name
The name of the stage to find.

Returns a copy of the specified stage.
stage
The stage to return.

Specifies the enabled state of a single stage.
stage
The stage to change.
enabled
The enabled state.

Sets the enabled state of all stages.
enabled
The enabled state.

Returns the enabled state of a stage.
stage
The stage to check.

Returns an attribute string from the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
defaultString
The default value if the attribute is not specified.

Returns an attribute int from the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
defaultString
The default value if the attribute is not specified.

Returns an attribute float from the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
defaultString
The default value if the attribute is not specified.

Returns an attribute bool from the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
defaultString
The default value if the attribute is not specified.

memberdef.argsstring: (int stage, const char *attribName, const char *value, bool addUndo=true)
memberdef.name: SetAttribute

detaileddescription.para:
Sets an attribute string in the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
value
The value to set.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (int stage, const char *attribName, int value, bool addUndo=true)
memberdef.name: SetAttributeInt

detaileddescription.para:
Sets an attribute int in the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
value
The value to set.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (int stage, const char *attribName, float value, bool addUndo=true)
memberdef.name: SetAttributeFloat

detaileddescription.para:
Sets an attribute float in the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
value
The value to set.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (int stage, const char *attribName, bool value, bool addUndo=true)
memberdef.name: SetAttributeBool

detaileddescription.para:
Sets an attribute bool in the material or a stage.
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
attribName
The name of the attribute.
value
The value to set.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

Sets the material name.
materialName
The new name of the material.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

Sets the entire dictionary for a material or stage
stage
The stage or -1 for the material.
data
The dictionary to copy.

Called when the editor modifies the source of the material.
text
The new source text.
Returns true if the source text of this material has been edited.
Applies any source changes to the edit representation of the material.
Returns the appropriate source for the editing

Adds a stage to the material.
stageType
The type of the stage: normal or special.
stageName
The name of the stage.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

memberdef.argsstring: (int stage, int stageType, const char *stageName, bool addUndo=true)
memberdef.name: InsertStage

detaileddescription.para:
Inserts a new stage to the material at a specified location.
stage
The location to insert the stage.
stageType
The type of the stage: normal or special.
stageName
The name of the stage.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

Removes a stage from the material.
stage
The stage to remove.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.
Removes all stages from the material.

Moves a stage from one location to another.
from
The original location of the stage.
to
The new location of the stage.
addUndo
Flag that specifies if the system should add an undo operation.

Applies any changes to the material
force
If true then the material will be applied regardless of the number of changes.
Saves the material.
Deletes the material.
Sets the proper internal states and notifies the MaterialDocManager once a material has been changed.

Passes text to a render material for parsing.
source
The text that sould be applied to the idMaterial.

Parses the source text from an idMaterial and initializes the editor dictionary representation of the material.
src
The idLexer object that contains the material text.

Parses a single stage from the source text from an idMaterial and initializes the editor dictionary representation of the material.
src
The idLexer object that contains the material text.

Adds a special stage to the material.
stageName
The name of the special stage bumpmap, diffusemap or specularmap
map
The map for the special stage.

Finds the appropriate material definition for the supplied token and initializes the internal dictionary data.
token
The token to lookup
src
The idLexer that contains the material source text.
type
The type of attribute grouping to use material, stage or special stage.
dict
The dictionary to initialize.
Cleans up the edit material by deleting the stage data structures.
Writes the internal dictionary data to the standard format.
Writes the internal dictionary data to the standard format and replaces the idMaterial source text with the newly generated text.

Writes a single stage.
stage
The stage to write.
file
The file where the stage should be wirtten

Writes a single special stage.
stage
The stage to write.
file
The file where the stage should be wirtten

memberdef.argsstring: (int stage, idFile_Memory *file, int type, int indent)
memberdef.name: WriteMaterialDef

detaileddescription.para:
Writes a set of material attributes to a file.
stage
The stage to write or -1 for the material.
file
The file where the stage should be wirtten.
type
The attribute grouping to use.
indent
The number of tabs to indent the text.
Responsible for managing a single material that is being viewed and/or edited.
